text: South American U-20 Women's Futsal Championship Logo The South American Under-20 Women's Futsal Championship (Spanish: Campeonato Sudamericano de Futsal Femenino Sub-20; Portuguese: Campeonato Sul-Americano de Futsal Feminino) is the U-20 version of Copa América Femenina de Futsal. ==Champions by year== {| class="wikitable" style="width:85%;" |- |Year: |! style="text- align:center; background:gold;"|Gold: |! style="text-align:center; background:silver;"|Silver: |! style="text-align:center; background:#c96;"|Bronze: |- | 2016 Asunción 15/07/2016 - 22/07/2016 | | | |- | 2018 Santiago 21/10/2018 - 28/10/2018 | | | |- | 2020 | colspan=3|Cancelled due to COVID-19 pandemic |} ==Medal Count== ==References== ==External links== *Sudamericano femenino sub 20 futsal Paraguay 2016 Category:Futsal competitions in South America Category:CONMEBOL competitions for women's national teams Category:Women's international futsal competitions
title: South American U-20 Women's Futsal Championship
